title: Mark Twain - The Million Pound Bank Note (BBC)
description:
The Million Pound Bank Note

From BBC Radio 4. Written by Mark Twain; Full-cast dramatisation; Dramatised by Bryony Lavery.

Stranded in London, a penniless young American becomes the subject of a Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â£20,000 bet between two wealthy English gentlemen. Can he can survive and prosper for a month as the bearer of a 1,000,000 pound bank note?
